thread.title: Future Electric Slides Into Larsa Pippen's Instagram & Causes Petty Pandemonium
thread.title_full: Future Electric Slides Into Larsa Pippen's Instagram & Causes Petty Pandemonium

author: Trent Clark
title: Future Electric Slides Into Larsa Pippen's Instagram & Causes Petty Pandemonium

organizations.name: future electric slides into larsa pippen

text:
6 
The Gram – “Rent Money,” the opening cut from Future’s recently released self-titled album, raised more than a few eyebrows with the obvious shot toward Scottie Pippen and his formerly estranged wife, Larsa : “I make the blogs with ya bitch cause I’m ruthless.” 
As it stands, Future’s pettiness knows no end. He blew up The Real Housewives of Miami star’s Instagram by simply leaving a yellow heart emoji captioned with “Forever” in the comments of one of her latest thirst traps. 
It didn’t take long for Instagram lurkers to light up her notifications, and Larsa attempted to nip the frenzy in the bud by turning off the comments for that particular post. 
Of course, the Future Hive resumed their mission elsewhere in her profile. 
Here are some of the lyrics to the track:
